blogs.title: Breaking the rules...
blogs.body: I mean, it's sort of exciting, isn't it, breaking the rules?
blogs.author: Hermione

blogs.title: Goodness
blogs.body: Dobby has heard of your greatness, sir, but of your goodness, Dobby never knew.
blogs.author: Dobby

blogs.title: Dreams
blogs.body: It does not do well to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
blogs.author: Albus
